title: SMC_Logical_Axis (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_Logical_Axis
the need to add a logical axis to the device tree.
Use the output variable
Axis
of type
AXIS_REF_LOGICAL_SM3
instead of
a logical axis.
If the function block is restarted, the logical axis is reinitialized.  The
master axis can be changed by restarting the function block.
Note that instances of this function block must not be assigned to other
instances of the same function block.  If you create your own function
block containing this function block, it is recommended to add the attribute
âno_assignâ to your function block as well.
